attributes.action:
Name and shame assessors working for DWP,
That have lied in their reports.
attributes.background:
Some of the assessors have been completing reports before they have even seen the claimant to save time,
And have been found out to be copying and pasting reports,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
